findings.title: Missing poolPrice validation in oracleSellDHPT()
findings.description: The DHPTSwap.oracleSellDHPT() and DHPTSwap.oracleBuyDHPT() functions do not validate the poolPrice parameter to prevent division by zero error and buying/selling at a zero rate.

findings.title: Not using safeTransfer
findings.description: The `DHedge.withdraw()` function did not make use of the `safeTransfer` function from the OpenZeppelin SafeERC20 library.
